activities always going on. All subways eastside and west nearby with
taxis on corner. Minutes by subway to all tourist destinations in
Manhattan. The apts works very nicely for traveling families, as they

item.title: Great place to stay @ the New Paltz Hostel as low as $30-night (New Paltz 145 Main street) $30
item.description:
Visit us on facebook http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-New-Paltz-Hostel/91348734987

******Click Here To Read Our Reviews ***** http://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10150215490654988&set=a.10150215490549988.384462.91348734987&type=1&theater



$30/night COED dorm room bed. ** CURFEW OF 10:00 PM STRICTLY ENFORCED FOR DORM ROOM ONLY**


$70/night large room 1-2 people - 3 people $84 - (private room with a PRIVATE BATHROOM) - ** NO CURFEW**


$80/night larger room 1-2 people - - 3 people $93 4 people $111 - (private room with a PRIVATE BATHROOM) ** NO CURFEW **

Call 845-255-6676

www.newpaltzhostel.com

Dear Travelers,


The New Paltz Hostel is nestled in the heart of the Mid-Hudson Valley, an area that is both rich in beauty and culturally unique. Our aim is to provide a welcome retreat from the usual hustle and bustle of "modern" life in an environment that is not only warmly comfortable, but economical and family-friendly as well. We receive guests from all over the globe, and a stay with us is not one you'll soon forget, no matter where you're coming from. We wish you a safe and productive journey and hope you will consider us in your future travels.



The Hostel is a destination which provides unique and budget-minded accommodations for travelers. Journeying on a budget need not be a stark and uncomfortable experience, and indeed it is one of our goals to purge this misconception. The New Paltz Hostel provides an inviting, interesting and fun atmosphere for a price which is fair and reasonable for all.


The usual stay at the Hostel is between one and five days, dependent on the schedules of our guests. The maximum stay is limited to two weeks.



We are located on Main Street near downtown New Paltz, and are next door to the local bus station which features fifteen daily trips to and from New York City.



We are also within walking distance of many area attractions, such as the State University of New York at New Paltz, historic Huguenot Street (the "Oldest street in America"), and a bevy of fine eateries and unique shops. We are also, minutes by car, from world-famous rock-climbing on the Shawangunk Ridge, hiking, mountain-biking, camping, the world-class Mohonk Mountain House and Preserve, and picturesque Minnewaska State Park. The area surrounding New Paltz also features many family-oriented activities including minor-league baseball at Dutchess Stadium, home of the Hudson Valley Renegades.




The Hostel offers shared accommodations, as well as private rooms. We provide the linens, a fully equipped, self-service kitchen, internet access, coin-op laundry, a pleasant and interesting staff, and most importantly, a degree of community and human interaction not found in more traditional "motel" or "hotel" facilities. Drugs, alcohol and tobacco are NOT allowed within the Hostel proper. Our spacious porch, has receptacles for the outdoor use of tobacco, but this is the only exception. There are staff persons available during our 4 p.m. to 12 a.m. office hours to handle booking, registration, information on the area, or to explain Hostel rules. We require, above all, that guests wish to enjoy a friendly and fruitful experience with fellow travelers from around the world, in an environment where all ages can enjoy the fun. The Hostel offers WiFi throughout the facility, and an Internet Connected computer and printer for use by those guests that do not have their own.

145 Main Street (google map) (yahoo map)

As the sun rises over the picturesque shores of Destin, you awaken in your 4th floor luxury beachfront condo.  Step outside to enjoy the purity of the fresh, clean air and enjoy the wafting calls of the seagulls as the sun warms to coast to a balmy 65 degrees.  No matter what you do with the rest of your day, it will surely be fantastic in this relaxing paradise.

You will love the view from the living room and king bedroom, as both of these rooms have floor to ceiling windows for an spectacular view of the Gulf of Mexico.

Individual owner, not through a rental service.

Destin organizes many winter activities geared towards snowbirds which include community events such as music, theater, health/wellness and various other events. 

Wouldn't it be fantastic to invite a few family members down to enjoy Thanksgiving or Christmas with you here too?  The condo sleeps up to 8 people comfortably and the kitchen is fully furnished with everything you need so that you can enjoy a wonderful home cooked holiday meal. 

Our condo has all of the modern comforts of home and we know you will love our condo so much you will want to return year after year!

Check us out at our website: http://www.beachfrontdestincondorentals.com

Includes:•Floor to ceiling windows in southeast corner unit on 12th floor with views south down 6th avenue •Flat screen TV with cable •Wireless internet •Doorman/valet services available in building •Laundry in building •Granite counter kitchen with newer black appliances (dishwasher, in-door water/ice refrigerator, four burner stove) •Hardwood floors throughout •Alcove sleeping area with queen sized luxurious bed (alcove includes curtain for separation) Plus Queen size deluxe (tall) Aero Bed air mattress f... Recent review (8 total)
Paula said"I have to agree with all the reviews for this stunning apartment. Our booking was also a little last minute, but Raquel was brilliant and helpful all the way through the process, and gave us some great advice and recommendations for our first ever stay in NYC. The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures, is exceptionally clean and comfortable and the views from the floor to ceiling windows are incredible! There are plenty of subway stations within easy walking distance that can connect you to every part of the city. Lots of local deli's and good quality food markets practically on the doorstep. Also, lots of parks nearby, our favorite being Madison Square Park, which is a short walk from the apartment and a very cool place to hang out. The doormen were very welcoming and extremely helpful (in fact, they couldn't do enough and went over and above to help us out, even printing off directions and recommending the best places for a quick bite!). We also found everyone else in the building to be extremely friendly as well. Certainly for first timers to New York, we wouldn't have experienced anywhere near as much of the various districts of the city had we not had such great advice and suggestions from Raquel, so, if like us, you are visiting NYC for the first time, be sure to ask Raquel for her favourite places to go; it will open you up to explore some great areas. This is the only place we want to stay at when we come back to New York, and have already recommended it to our friend who is travelling over in a few weeks time. Why stay in a hotel when you can stay in this gorgeous apartment in a brilliant location, and feel like a true New Yorker! A must stay place for anyone visiting NYC. Can't recommend this, or Raquel, highly enough. Thanks for our stay Raquel, we will definitely be coming back!!! Paula & Frank"

Description

See FULL Website for more details including ALL Seasonal Rental Rates & FLOOR PLANS showing all bedroom & bed arrangements: NearSuncadia.com
Please contact: Owner at NearSuncadia.com
Enjoy our new PRIVATE HOT TUB all year, and the Roslyn Ridge Swimming Pool (warm seasons).


Have your next CORPORATE or ACADEMIC Conference/Retreat in a far MORE COMFORTABLE LODGE SETTING, also LESS EXPENSIVE than hotel/motel rooms and "function halls". With 3 Living Areas and 3 Dining Areas, there is also room for "Break-out" Sessions when needed.

Or have your small WEDDING, ANNIVERSARY, or SPECIAL BIRTHDAY CELEBRATIONS!

(Lower Rates for "DAYTIME ONLY" meetings for local groups, one day or multi-day; Discounts for Non-Profit Organizations.)

NOTE: Additional bedrooms are available right nearby, for the privacy expected by professionals, while still using the main Lodge ("THE Cabin Near Suncadia") for main meetings, meals, informal conversations, and relaxation...

Catering is available (full or partial), or eat "out", or cook together in 2 kitchens plus outdoor grill.
Private HOT TUB available all year; Professional Quality Slate Pool Table, Ping Pong, Foosball, Wii System Modules, multiple cable TV/DVDs, secure WiFi.

ENJOY A GOLF VACATION DURING THAT NEXT BUSINESS TRIP TO SEATTLE and the HIGH TECH FIRMS!
Play at the new World Class SUNCADIA GOLF RESORT!

Play 18 holes at Suncadia's Prospector Golf Course, or 9 holes at Suncadia's new Rope Rider Course!
(The final 9 holes are under construction, for play next year.)

The Cabin is just a ONE HOUR DRIVE on I-90 through the BEAUTIFUL CASCADE MOUNTAINS, you will find SUNNIER AND WARMER SUMMERS than Seattle has.

This is NOT your "typical Seattle weather"!

This 3-level rustic-style Cabin (4,300 sq ft) has a PRIVATE HOT TUB, and includes 6BR + Loft, 5.5BA, 2 FULL KITCHENS, Multiple Living and Dining Areas, and all the modern conveniences; Vaulted ceiling in main living and dining areas; Pool Table, Foosball, & Ping Pong; Direct-Entry 2-car Garage.


"THE Cabin Near Suncadia" FEATURES:

- 6 Bedrooms plus Sleeping Loft;
--- Main Level Master Suite includes bedroom with private balcony,
and Master Bath with Whirlpool Tub, Double Sinks, and Separate Shower/Lav Room;
- 2 Additional Ensuite Master Bedrooms;
- 5.5 Bathrooms;
- 2 FULL KITCHENS;
- 3 Living Rooms including Sitting Loft;
- 3 Dining Rooms including Breakfast Area;
- 2 sets of full-sized washers and dryers;
- Attached Direct-Entry 2-car Garage; additional parking available.

Beds sleep up to 35
Dining areas seat more than 30

2 FULL KITCHENS; All Counters are Slab Granite; All Stainless Appliances;
2 sets of full-sized washers/dryers.

VACATION CABIN FOR RENT BY OWNER: FULLY FURNISHED, perfect for large extended family groups. The separate living and dining areas provide both space and privacy for everyone.

Private HOT TUB available ALL YEAR.

Leather recliners and rustic cabin-style furniture add to the comfort and ambiance. There are large patios from the lower level, and a balcony off the main living room. Patio furniture is set up during mild weather.

Rental Rates begin at $395 (ask about weekly rates or LAST MINUTE SPECIALS).

This beautiful cabin is perfect to enjoy quiet time away from the city or to spend quality time with family and friends. The Cabin is on a quiet cul-de-sac approximately mid-way between SUNCADIA Golf Resort and Lake Cle Elum, approximately 50-90 minutes from the Seattle metro area, just minutes from Interstate 90.

- Everything is new;
- All five full bathrooms have full-size tubs and showers;
- Both Kitchens and All Bathrooms have Solid Granite Countertops;
- There is an attached two car garage with direct entry to the main level;
- All bed and bath linens are supplied, including pool towels;
-- (Freshly laundered duvet covers greet all arriving guests)
- Both kitchens are fully equipped with all basic cooking and dining supplies;
- Full-Sized Professional Quality Pool Table;
- Foosball Table;
- Ping Pong;
- Fully AIR CONDITIONED for comfort in warm weather.
- 3 zones for heat & air conditioning for year-round comfort in all Cabin levels.

- Snowmobiles are allowed.

Come see what Suncadia, Ronald, Roslyn, and Cle Elum have to offer!
You will find sunnier and warmer summers and colder and snowier winters. Enjoy the local seasonal fun of golf, snow mobile rentals, horseback riding, hiking, biking, boating, cross country skiing, fishing, bridge jumping, lake swimming, snow shoeing, down hill skiing, river rafting, museums and historical town walks, movie theater, dining, and access to all Suncadia public facilities (including Suncadia's Prospector public golf course, Glade Spa services, fine dining at several restaurants, ice skating, bicycle rentals for families, and concerts). Local activities include wandering around the old mining town of Roslyn (renamed "Cicely, Alaska" for the series "Northern Exposure"). All of this is within a few minutes' drive from the Cabin. In the summertime, the Roslyn Ridge community recreational facilities are available, including the pool, lodge, large hot tub, tennis, volleyball, and basketball courts, with refreshments available.

This cabin is NEWLY AVAILABLE for RENT BY OWNER.
(Please check for installation date for the Horseshoes; seasonal dates for the Roslyn Ridge Pool. The Cabin's PRIVATE HOT TUB is operated all year!)

ABSOLUTELY NO PETS AND NO SMOKING PLEASE!
(NO EXCEPTIONS ALLOWED for medical reasons.)
